UseCase.name: Safety Features for ODD

CPS.furtherInformation: Concerns about function including transportaion infrustructure, road type and condition, Obstacle type and location, environmental condition, vehicle status etc.
CPS.name: Functional Aspects

CPS.furtherInformation: Concerns about operational constraints, traffic/right-of-way rules, infrastructure standards, vehicle type and classification, etc.
CPS.name: Business Aspects

CPS.furtherInformation: Concerns about human interaction with and as part of a CPS, fallback driver presence, owner rules, passenger presence etc.
CPS.name: Human Aspects

CPS.furtherInformation: Concerns about trustworthiness of CPS including security, privacy, safety, reliability, resilience, Critical function redundancy, DDT Fallback, MRC capability/competence etc.
CPS.name: Trustworthiness Aspects

CPS.furtherInformation: Concerns about time and frequency, including the generation and transport of time and frequency signals, timestamping, managing latency, V2V and V2I synchronization, etc.
CPS.name: Timing Aspects

CPS.furtherInformation: Concerns about data interoperability including Operational Data such as real-time traffic/historical traffic patterns data, V2V and V2I communication and connectivity etc.
CPS.name: Data Aspects

CPS.furtherInformation: Concerns about function including communication among on and off-vehicle, infrastrucutre Connectivity e.g. V2V and V2I communications, vehicle bus, Wireless Links etc.
CPS.name: Communications Aspects

CPS.furtherInformation: Concerns related to demarcations of topological, geolocation, zones, weather restrictions, jurisdictions, Sensing/Actuation Operating Ranges etc.
CPS.name: Boundaries Aspects

CPS.furtherInformation: Concerns related to the traffic management systems, cross-infrastructure integration, connected and co-ordinated vehicles, safety protocols in platoons etc.
CPS.name: Composition Aspects

CPS.furtherInformation: Concerns about the lifecycle of CPS including vehicle component lifetime limits, infrastructure lifetime limits, infrastructure wear status, Vehicle Reflash/FOTA, durability etc.
CPS.name: Lifecycle Aspects
